p:
The ZIKV strain used in this study was RIO-U1, which was isolated in 2016 from urine of a patient from Rio de Janeiro state, Brazil (GenBank Accession number: KU926309), as described elsewhere
49 . Viral stocks of ZIKV Rio-U1 were prepared by infecting Vero cell monolayers. The titer (PFU/ml) and the genome integrity were determined as described elsewhere
49 . Samples of the stock were used in the TEC infection assays. Vero cell cultures were also applied to test the infectivity of virus particles derived from infected TEC.
